title: Didjeridu: with Charlie McMahon
creator_credit: Paul Tait, Jeni Kendell and Gaia Films
brief_description: A journey with Charlie McMahon from the famed band “Gondwanaland” into the beautiful country of the Northern Territory. Accompanied by Aboriginal players and makers of the didjeridu, we see how the instruments are made and played by experts.
creator_credit_for_label: Paul Tait, Jeni Kendell and Gaia Films
